title: elizaos Eliza (2024-12-18)
overview: Development focused on new features (Shorten response verbosity). with 25 contributors merging 86 PRs. Major work included various improvements.

chores: update typescript and related to v8 (major)

issues_summary: working on 9 bugs including 'Knowledge system is disabled', 'TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'queueTextCompletion')' and implementing 13 feature requests including 'Refine Boredom Provider', 'Fix function calling, repetition and local action calling'

top_contributors.name: lalalune
top_contributors.summary: Lalalune is actively merging pull requests to improve the project's functionality, including fixes for recall by agent ID, generating changelogs, updating server ports, and downgrading dependencies like ONNX Runtime

top_contributors.name: renovate
top_contributors.summary: Renovate is actively updating dependencies for security and compatibility improvements across various packages, including major updates to rollup, react monorepo, and react-router-dom

top_contributors.name: ponderingdemocritus
top_contributors.summary: Ponderingdemocritus is actively developing the Eliza project, focusing on improving logging, code cleanliness through TypeScript ref path additions, and custom actions integration
